text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]T: \mathbb R^9 \rightarrow \mathbb R^3[/mathjaxinline] be a linear transformation. If the image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is a two-dimensional subspace of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^3[/mathjaxinline], what is the dimension of its kernel?

font.p: The image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is two-dimensional, and thus the rank of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is 2. The dimension of the domain of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is 9. Therefore, the nullity of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is [mathjaxinline]9-2=7[/mathjaxinline].
